name: Panic Room (mmaukery)
description:
Panic Room is a series of horror themed escape rooms — each with different storylines and puzzles — intended to be played like a tabletop roleplay game. Each room comes with everything you need in the download and each room is flexible to suit players' comfort. 

The game supports 2-5 players, one acting as the GM and the rest are players. To play, players needs a voice/video call platform and the ability to access private messages.

Download includes a pdf explaining how to play and separate pdfs for GM notes for each room.

AVALIABLE ROOMS:

  • The Mansion: Ghost hunters are called to investigate a mansion for it's unexplained activity in the middle of the night.

More to come.
